verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> heard פַּשְׁחוּר֙ <WH6583> Now Pashur בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אִמֵּ֣ר <WH564> of Immer הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> who פָקִ֥יד <WH6496> who [was] also chief נָגִ֖יד <WH5057> governor בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶֽת־ <WH853> יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> that Jeremiah נִבָּ֖א <WH5012> prophesied אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <WH1697> these things הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

וַיַּכֶּ֣ה <WH5221> smote פַשְׁח֔וּר <WH6583> Then Pashur אֵ֖ת <WH853> יִרְמְיָ֣הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֑יא <WH5030> the prophet וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> and put אֹת֜וֹ <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> in הַמַּהְפֶּ֗כֶת <WH4115> him in the stocks אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which בְּשַׁ֤עַר <WH8179> gate בִּנְיָמִן֙ <WH1144> of Benjamin הָֽעֶלְי֔וֹן <WH5945> that [were] in the high אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> which [was] by the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <WH4283> And it came to pass on the morrow וַיֹּצֵ֥א <WH3318> brought forth פַשְׁח֛וּר <WH6583> that Pashur אֶֽת־ <WH853> יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah מִן־ <WH4480> from הַמַּהְפָּ֑כֶת <WH4115> out of the stocks וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> about יִרְמְיָ֗הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah לֹ֤א <WH3808> not פַשְׁחוּר֙ <WH6583> Pashur קָרָ֤א <WH7121> hath not called יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto him The LORD שְׁמֶ֔ךָ <WH8034> thy name כִּ֖י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo מָג֥וֹר מִסָּבִֽיב׃ <WH4036> but Magormissabib פ

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹ֣ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֡ה <WH3068> the LORD הִנְנִי֩ <WH2005> I am going נֹתֶנְךָ֨ <WH5414> Behold I will make לְמָג֜וֹר <WH4032> thee a terror לְךָ֣ וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> all אֹהֲבֶ֗יךָ <WH157> to thyself and to all thy friends וְנָֽפְל֛וּ <WH5307> and they shall fall בְּחֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> by the sword אֹיְבֵיהֶ֖ם <WH341> of their enemies וְעֵינֶ֣יךָ <WH5869> and thine eyes רֹא֑וֹת <WH7200> shall behold וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> all Judah אֶתֵּן֙ <WH5414> [it] and I will give בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> into the hand מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon וְהִגְלָ֥ם <WH1540> and he shall carry them captive בָּבֶ֖לָה <WH894> into Babylon וְהִכָּ֥ם <WH5221> and shall slay בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> them with the sword

וְנָתַתִּ֗י <WH5414> Moreover I will deliver אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֹ֙סֶן֙ <WH2633> all the strength הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> of this city הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְגִיעָ֖הּ <WH3018> and all the labours וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all יְקָרָ֑הּ <WH3366> thereof and all the precious things וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אוֹצְר֜וֹת <WH214> thereof and all the treasures מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> of the kings יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah אֶתֵּן֙ <WH5414> will I give בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> into the hand אֹֽיְבֵיהֶ֔ם <WH341> of their enemies וּבְזָזוּם֙ <WH962> which shall spoil וּלְקָח֔וּם <WH3947> them and take וֶהֱבִיא֖וּם <WH935> them and carry בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <WH894> them to Babylon

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> and you פַשְׁח֗וּר <WH6583> And thou Pashur וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> and all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> and all that dwell בֵיתֶ֔ךָ <WH1004> in thine house תֵּלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> will go בַּשֶּׁ֑בִי <WH7628> into captivity וּבָבֶ֣ל <WH894> to Babylon תָּב֗וֹא <WH935> and thou shalt come וְשָׁ֤ם <WH8033> and there תָּמוּת֙ <WH4191> and there thou shalt die וְשָׁ֣ם <WH8033> and there תִּקָּבֵ֔ר <WH6912> and shalt be buried אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֹ֣הֲבֶ֔יךָ <WH157> there thou and all thy friends אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> to whom נִבֵּ֥אתָ <WH5012> to whom thou hast prophesied לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> you בַּשָּֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> lies ס

פִּתִּיתַ֤נִי <WH6601> thou hast deceived יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> O LORD וָֽאֶפָּ֔ת <WH6601> me and I was deceived חֲזַקְתַּ֖נִי <WH2388> thou art stronger וַתּוּכָ֑ל <WH3201> than I and hast prevailed הָיִ֤יתִי <WH1961> have become לִשְׂחוֹק֙ <WH7814> I am in derision כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> daily כֻּלֹּ֖ה <WH3605> Everyone לֹעֵ֥ג <WH3932> every one mocketh לִֽי׃

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because מִדֵּ֤י <WH1767> For since אֲדַבֵּר֙ <WH1696> I spake אֶזְעָ֔ק <WH2199> I cried out חָמָ֥ס <WH2555> violence וָשֹׁ֖ד <WH7701> and spoil אֶקְרָ֑א <WH7121> I cried כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because הָיָ֨ה <WH1961> has resulted דְבַר־ <WH1697> because the word יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD לִ֛י לְחֶרְפָּ֥ה <WH2781> was made a reproach וּלְקֶ֖לֶס <WH7047> unto me and a derision כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> daily

וְאָמַרְתִּ֣י <WH559> Then I said לֹֽא־ <WH3808> cannot אֶזְכְּרֶ֗נּוּ <WH2142> I will not make mention וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> cannot אֲדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> of him nor speak עוֹד֙ <WH5750> anymore בִּשְׁמ֔וֹ <WH8034> any more in his name וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> becomes בְלִבִּי֙ <WH3820> But [his word] was in mine heart כְּאֵ֣שׁ <WH784> fire בֹּעֶ֔רֶת <WH1197> as a burning עָצֻ֖ר <WH6113> shut up בְּעַצְמֹתָ֑י <WH6106> in my bones וְנִלְאֵ֥יתִי <WH3811> and I was weary כַּֽלְכֵ֖ל <WH3557> with forbearing וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> cannot אוּכָֽל׃ <WH3201> and I could

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for שָׁמַ֜עְתִּי <WH8085> For I heard דִּבַּ֣ת <WH1681> the defaming רַבִּים֮ <WH7227> of many מָג֣וֹר <WH4032> fear מִסָּבִיב֒ <WH5439> on every side הַגִּ֙ידוּ֙ <WH5046> Report וְנַגִּידֶ֔נּוּ <WH5046> [say they] and we will report כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> All אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <WH582> another שְׁלוֹמִ֔י <WH7965> my trusted שֹׁמְרֵ֖י <WH8104> watched צַלְעִ֑י <WH6761> my fall אוּלַ֤י <WH194> Perhaps יְפֻתֶּה֙ <WH6601> [saying] Peradventure he will be enticed וְנ֣וּכְלָה <WH3201> and we shall prevail ל֔וֹ וְנִקְחָ֥ה <WH3947> against him and we shall take נִקְמָתֵ֖נוּ <WH5360> our revenge מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> But

וַֽיהוָ֤ה <WH3068> But the LORD אוֹתִי֙ <WH854> for כְּגִבּ֣וֹר <WH1368> [is] with me as a mighty עָרִ֔יץ <WH6184> terrible one עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֛ן <WH3651> after that רֹדְפַ֥י <WH7291> therefore my persecutors יִכָּשְׁל֖וּ <WH3782> shall stumble וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and not יֻכָ֑לוּ <WH3201> and they shall not prevail בֹּ֤שׁוּ <WH954> ashamed מְאֹד֙ <WH3966> they shall be greatly כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not הִשְׂכִּ֔ילוּ <WH7919> for they shall not prosper כְּלִמַּ֥ת <WH3639> confusion עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> [their] everlasting לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִשָּׁכֵֽחַ׃ <WH7911> shall never be forgotten

וַיהוָ֤ה <WH3068> But O LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts בֹּחֵ֣ן <WH974> that triest צַדִּ֔יק <WH6662> the righteous רֹאֶ֥ה <WH7200> [and] seest כְלָי֖וֹת <WH3629> the reins וָלֵ֑ב <WH3820> and the heart אֶרְאֶ֤ה <WH7200> let me see נִקְמָֽתְךָ֙ <WH5360> thy vengeance מֵהֶ֔ם <WH1992> like כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> on גִּלִּ֥יתִי <WH1540> on them for unto thee have I opened אֶת־ <WH853> רִיבִֽי׃ <WH7379> my cause ס

שִׁ֚ירוּ <WH7891> Sing לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD הַֽלְל֖וּ <WH1984> praise אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> ye the LORD כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הִצִּ֛יל <WH5337> for he hath delivered אֶת־ <WH853> נֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> the soul אֶבְי֖וֹן <WH34> of the poor מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> from the hand מְרֵעִֽים׃ <WH7489> of evildoers ס

אָר֣וּר <WH779> Cursed הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> [be] the day אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> when יֻלַּ֖דְתִּי <WH3205> wherein I was born בּ֑וֹ י֛וֹם <WH3117> let not the day אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> when יְלָדַ֥תְנִי <WH3205> bare אִמִּ֖י <WH517> wherein my mother אַל־ <WH408> nay יְהִ֥י <WH1961> become בָרֽוּךְ׃ <WH1288> me be blessed

אָר֣וּר <WH779> Cursed הָאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> [be] the man אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who בִּשַּׂ֤ר <WH1319> who brought tidings אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִי֙ <WH1> to my father לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying יֻֽלַּד־ <WH3205> is born לְךָ֖ בֵּ֣ן <WH1121> child זָכָ֑ר <WH2145> A man שַׂמֵּ֖חַ <WH8056> glad שִׂמֳּחָֽהוּ׃ <WH8056> glad

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> become הָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> And let that man הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he כֶּֽעָרִ֛ים <WH5892> be as the cities אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Which הָפַ֥ךְ <WH2015> overthrew יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> without נִחָ֑ם <WH5162> and repented וְשָׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> not and let him hear זְעָקָה֙ <WH2201> the cry בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וּתְרוּעָ֖ה <WH8643> and the shouting בְּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> at צָהֳרָֽיִם׃ <WH6672> noon

אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> Because לֹא־ <WH3808> did not מוֹתְתַ֖נִי <WH4191> Because he slew מֵרָ֑חֶם <WH7358> me not from the womb וַתְּהִי־ <WH1961> have been לִ֤י אִמִּי֙ <WH517> or that my mother קִבְרִ֔י <WH6913> might have been my grave וְרַחְמָ֖הֿ <WH7358> and her womb הֲרַ֥ת <WH2030> great עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> [to be] always

לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> Why זֶּה֙ <WH2088> ever מֵרֶ֣חֶם <WH7358> out of the womb יָצָ֔אתִי <WH3318> Wherefore came I forth לִרְא֥וֹת <WH7200> to see עָמָ֖ל <WH5999> labour וְיָג֑וֹן <WH3015> and sorrow וַיִּכְל֥וּ <WH3615> should be consumed בְּבֹ֖שֶׁת <WH1322> ashamed יָמָֽי׃ <WH3117> that my days פ
